citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A male rhesus macaque ( 31236 ) assigned to Protocol 1516 had 3 serial blood draws ( 10/10/23, 10/24/23 , 11/7/23 ) .
The approved IACUC protocol describes random blood draws and specifically states if serial blood draws are needed
there will be a separate IACUC protocol for that activity . Failure to follow the approved protocol may affect the health and
well-being of the animals. This is a significant change regarding the care of animals in an ongoing activity that was not
reviewed by the IACUC. The IACUC must ensure that all significant changes regarding the care and use of animals in
ongoing activities are reviewed and approved prior to implementation. CORRECT BY : 11/23/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees..
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(7) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
A male rhesus macaque ( 31236 ) assigned to Protocol 1516 had 3 serial blood draws ( 10/10/23, 10/24/23 , 11/7/23 ) . 
The approved IACUC protocol describes random blood draws and specifically states if serial blood draws are needed 
there will be a separate IACUC protocol for that activity . Failure to follow the approved protocol may affect the health and 
well-being of the animals. This is a significant change regarding the care of animals in an ongoing activity that was not 
reviewed by the IACUC. The IACUC must ensure that all significant changes regarding the care and use of animals in 
ongoing activities are reviewed and approved prior to implementation. CORRECT BY : 11/23/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees..
